subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
Restoration and Renovation
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ training complex in Port St. Lucie, Fla., was expanded over the winter to lure a second tenant and maintain the team’s number of nearby opponents.
snippet: The Mets’ training complex in Port St. Lucie, Fla., was expanded over the winter to lure a second tenant and maintain the team’s number of nearby opponents.
